title: Basilisk Knight

properties.value: Basilisk Knights are a Slayer creature that can be found in the Jormungand's Prison beneath the Island of Stone, requiring level 60 Slayer and completion of The Fremennik Exiles to kill. Like cockatrice and basilisks, players must equip a mirror shield or V's shield when fighting these monsters or they will take heavy damage and their stats will be drained.

Monster ID9293

Basilisk Knights are a Slayer creature that can be found in the Jormungand's Prison beneath the Island of Stone, requiring level 60 Slayer and completion of The Fremennik Exiles to kill. Like cockatrice and basilisks, players must equip a mirror shield or V's shield when fighting these monsters or they will take heavy damage and their stats will be drained.

The basilisk knight has an improved drop table from regular basilisks, and can drop the basilisk jaw, which can be used to upgrade the Helm of Neitiznot to the Neitiznot faceguard.

Players cannot use a dwarf multicannon on Basilisk Knights, as the only places players can place a cannon in the Jormungand's Prison are those which contain dagannoth.

Jormungand's Prison20420Maplink

Drops[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 348,500 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

When on a slayer task, the average Basilisk Knight kill is worth 21,478.

When not on a slayer task, the average Basilisk Knight kill is worth 7,694.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

Basilisk Knights have had their special attack removed.

2 October 2019
(update)
  • The knight's stats were increased.
  • A special attack has been added, which is similar to the one used by The Jormungand.
  • Basilisk Knights can no longer be safespotted.
